attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Set the text through the value attribute. Load copy displayed below the load icon

attrs.name: fullscreen
attrs.desc: Set type to true to display the full screen. Same as the fullscreen modifier in the v-loading instruction
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: target
attrs.desc: Loading the DOM node to be overwritten. A DOM object or character string can be transferred. If a character string is transferred, it is transferred to document.querySelector as a parameter to obtain the corresponding DOM node.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is document.body

attrs.name: body
attrs.desc: The same as the body modifier in the v-loading instruction
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: lock
attrs.desc: The same as the lock modifier in the v-loading instruction
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.
